author: Brodigan
description:
The most odious among us, the Reddit Users, are celebrating and gloating over the death of Charlie Kirk. Meanwhile, the media and prominent Leftists are rapidly trying to construct a narrative about the life of Charlie Kirk and the circumstances surrounding his assassination. We go over the lies, damn lies, and statistics the Left is pushing to undercut Charlie’s work.

SUSPECT UPDATE

  • BREAKING: Trump announces Charlie Kirk's suspected assassin in custody
title: 🔴 BREAKING: Shooter Caught & Shooting Eyewitness Joins to Discuss What He Saw (Sources)

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

It took all of ten minutes with my morning coffee to want to throw my hand-etched mug at my computer. I know that you know how much the media sucks at life. And how much vitriol the people who work at these journalisming outlets have for anyone who has a different opinion than them. We've all seen the Slack channels.

Ten minutes was all it took before I was hit with not one, not two, but three examples of why we loathe the media. Let's start with Rolling Stone, which has sucked ever since their hit piece on Stillwater. They've noticed the increase in unemployment at schools and medical practices in the wake of Charlie Kirk's assassinatio
title: Three Friday examples of how the media is a failed institution that sucks at life in the Charlie Kirk aftermath
